name: src/Auth.js
Auth
description: Managing the session between jexia-sdk-js and Jexia.

name: constructor
description: Create a new Auth object with some initial values.

name: init
description: Initialize a new session between jexia-sdk-js and Jexia

name: getToken
description: Get current token

name: getRefreshToken
description: Get current refresh token

name: setToken
description: Set current token

name: setRefreshToken
description: Set current refresh token

name: autoRefresh
description: Refresh the session after a given time delay

emits.description: emit an authentication event when we successfully refreshed the session with Jexia

name: src/Bus.js
Bus
description: Global singleton event bus for dataset subscriptions.

name: constructor
description: Call EventEmitter constructor

name: src/Dataset.js
Dataset
description: Dataset CRUD operations and realtime subscriptions

name: constructor
description: Create a dataset object with some initial values.

name: list
description: List all records

name: query
description: Query a dataset with query parameters

name: info
description: Get information about the dataset, such as total records

name: create
description: Create a new record on the dataset

name: update
description: Update a record on the dataset

name: delete
description: Delete a record from the dataset

name: getUrl
description: Get dataset url

name: getEventNamespace
description: Get dataset namespace

name: request
description: Http request

name: subscribe
description:
Subscribe to realtime notfications
The event name can be:
1. None => Any kind of activity
2. '*' => Any kind of activity
3. 'created' => Only created rows
4. 'updated' => Only updated rows
5. 'deleted' => Only deleted rows

name: unsubscribe
description: Unsubscribe from realtime notfications

JexiaClient

description: Create a new JexiaClient object with some initial values.

RealtimeClient
description: Managing real time events

name: constructor
description: Create a new RealTimeClient object with some initial values.

name: attachEventHandlers
description: Attach responsible event handlers

name: onSubscription
description: Responsible for handling a new subscription

name: onToken
description: Responsible for handling a new token

name: getEventWithoutNamespace
description: get event name without namespace

name: setToken
description: Set the current token
